resources.string:
The permissions can be granted using your computer with adb:

adb -d shell pm grant com.franco.demomode android.permission.DUMP
adb -d shell pm grant com.franco.demomode android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
Both permissions need to be granted for the tile to work.
Both permissions were successfully granted with root!
Permissions could not be granted. Make sure that you have rooted your phone or try with adb.
Use root to grant the permissions
For transparency this app\'s source code is available at GitHub
